name: bnj226
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpbir(wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2)
-| wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2))
-| wb(wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2)
-| wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2))
-| wb(wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2))
-| wss(c1, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2)
-| wb(wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
-| wss(c1, c2)

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2)
-| wss(c1, c2)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
